descriptionText: Thank you for your interest in volunteering for COVID-19 research. If you’re a U.S. Veteran, please answer the questions below and we’ll add you to our VA volunteer registry. If we think you may meet the criteria for a research study, we’ll contact you for a phone interview.  Note: We won’t share your information with anyone outside of VA. If you're not a  Veteran, you can volunteer through the  COVID-19 Prevention Network.

diagnosed.ui:title: Have ever been diagnosed with COVID-19?

hospitalized.ui:title: Have you been hospitalized at any time in the past 6 months?

smokeOrVape.ui:title: Do you smoke or vape, or do you have a past history of smoking or vaping?

healthHistory.description: Do you have a history of any of the health issues listed below?
healthHistory.ui:title: Do you have a history of any of the health issues listed below?

employmentStatus.description: Which work situation best describes you?
employmentStatus.ui:title: Which work situation best describes you?

transportation.ui:title: How do you get to work?

residents.ui:title: How many people live in your home?

closeContact.ui:title: On most days, how many people do you have close contact with outside of those who live in your home?
closeContact.ui:description: We define close contact as being within 6 feet of a person.
